title: NBA Trade Deadline, Part 1: Orlandoâ€™s Big Day With Ryen Russillo and Kevin Clark
description:
In Part 1 of the NBA trade deadline coverage on the 'BS Pod,' The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo and Orlando Magic fan Kevin Clark to discuss Orlando's rebuild; the team trading Aaron Gordon to the Nuggets, Nikola Vucevic to the Bulls, and Evan Fournier to the Celtics; how Wendell Carter Jr. will fit in with the Magic; and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
